member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IConnectivity
member.summary: Provides access to device's connectivity options like Bluetooth.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IConnectivity.IsBluetoothEnabled
member.summary: Whether Bluetooth is enabled on the device.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IConnectivity.OpenEnableBluetoothPrompt
member.summary: Opens the native OS dialog asking user to enable Bluetooth.
member.returns: true on success, false if Bluetooth is already enabled, or on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.StopAndDeinitializeNative
member.summary: Stop and deinitialize native Obj-C side gracefully.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery
member.summary: Provides full programmatic access to the peer discovery API. Allows implementing complex custom behaviours (like auto-joining the session or implementing a in-game peer discovery interface).

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.PeerFound
member.summary: Occurs when a new peer is found.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.PeerLost
member.summary: Occurs when a known peer is lost.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.StartFailed
member.summary: Occurs when starting the discovery has failed.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.StartDiscovery
member.summary: Starts discovery of nearby peers.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.StopDiscovery
member.summary: Stop discovery of nearby peers.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomPeerDiscovery.InvitePeer(LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.PeerId,System.Single)
member.summary: Invites peer to the current session.
member.param: Maximum time for peer to accept the invitation.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser
member.summary: Provides full programmatic access to the service advertiser API. Allows implementing complex custom behaviours (like auto-joining the session or implementing a in-game invitation accept/decline interface).

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser.InvitationReceived
member.summary: Occurs when an invitation to join the session has been received.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser.StartFailed
member.summary: Occurs when starting the advertiser has failed.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser.IsAdvertising
member.summary: Whether advertiser is currently active.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser.StartAdvertising(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Start advertising the current service to nearby peers.
member.param: Additional information that will be advertised to the peer browsers. Keep the size of this dictionary small for best network performance.
member.returns: true on success, false if already advertising.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ICustomServiceAdvertiser.StopAdvertising
member.summary: Stops advertising of the current service to nearby peers.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.DispatchDeferredEvents
member.summary: Dispatches the recorded events.

member.name: F:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.NativeEvent.EventData
member.summary: Pointer to the native event data.

member.summary: Marshals the native array of pointers to native structs to a managed array.

member.summary: Marshals the native array of pointers to native structs to a managed array.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.MarshalUtility.MarshalNativeStructArray``1(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Marshals a native linear array of structs to the managed array.

member.summary: Marshals the native representation to a IDictionary<string, string>.

member.summary: Marshals a IDictionary<string, string> to the native internal representation.

member.summary: Marshals data from an unmanaged block of memory to a newly allocated managed object of the specified type.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ILog
member.summary: Controls

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ILog.SetVerboseLog(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables verbose log mode.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ILog.SetLogForwarding(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables or disables forwarding native logs to Unity.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery
member.summary: Access to the native built-in service advertiser. Whenever another peer sends an invitation, present a dialog that allows declining or accepting the invitation. Very easy to use and setup, but limited to a single interaction model.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery.Cancelled
member.summary: Occurs when "Cancel" button is pressed in the peer browser UI.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery.Finished
member.summary: Occurs when "Finish" button is pressed in the peer browser UI.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery.NearbyPeerPresenting
member.summary: Occurs when a peer is found and is about to be presented in the peer browser UI. Note: this event is called on a background thread, which means that you can't access Unity APIs from within the handler of this event.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery.OpenBrowser(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Opens the peer browser UI.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IPeerDiscovery.CloseBrowser
member.summary: Closes the peer browser UI.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser
member.summary: Access to the native built-in service advertiser. Whenever another peer sends an invitation, present a dialog that allows declining or accepting the invitation. Very easy to use and setup, but limited to a single interaction model.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser.InvitationDismissed
member.summary: Occurs when user taps "Dismiss" or "Accept" in the incoming invitation UI.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser.InvitationPresenting
member.summary: Occurs when incoming invitation UI is about to be shown.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser.IsAdvertising
member.summary: Whether advertiser is currently active.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser.StartAdvertising(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Start advertising the current service to nearby peers.
member.param: Additional information that will be advertised to the peer browsers. Keep the size of this dictionary small for best network performance.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.IServiceAdvertiser.StopAdvertising
member.summary: Stops advertising of the current service to nearby peers.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession
member.summary: Provides access to the local multiplayer session, setting the peer name, service type, getting other peers that are connected to the session.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.PeerStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the connection state of a peer has changed.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.Started
member.summary: Occurs when session has been started.

member.name: E:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.Stopped
member.summary: Occurs when session has been stopped.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.IsSessionActive
member.summary: Whether session is currently active.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.SetServiceType(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the service type identifier.
member.param: Text identifier of the service. Effectively, the name of the "room". Must be the same for all peers who want to join the session. Can be up to 15 characters long, valid characters are ASCII lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.SetLocalPeerName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the name of the local peer.
member.param: Name of the local peer that will be displayed to peer browsers. Can be up to 63 bytes in UTF8 encoding.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.SetServerPort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the server port. Must be called before starting the networking server.
member.param: Server port number. Must be the same as used by the networking server.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.StartSession
member.summary: Starts the session.
member.returns: true on success, false on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.StopSession
member.summary: Disconnects current device from the session, stops all service advertisers and peer browsers.
member.returns: true on success, false if session is not started, or on error.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.GetConnectedPeersCount
member.summary: Gets the number of peers that are connected to the session.
member.returns: Number of peers that are connected to the session.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.GetConnectedPeers
member.summary: Gets the array of peers that are connected to the session.
member.returns: Array of peers that are connected to the session.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.ISession.GetConnectedPeers(LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.PeerId[])
member.summary: Gets peers that are connected to the session, and stores them in the provided buffer.
member.param: The buffer to store the results in.
member.returns: The amount of peers stored to the buffer.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.Utility.StringToValidServiceTypeName(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms a string into a valid service type name. It can be up to 15 characters long, valid characters are ASCII lowercase letters, numbers, and the hyphen.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.AppleLocalMultiplayer.Utility.TruncateStringToEncodingBytes(System.String,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Truncates the strings to a number of bytes in a given encoding.
member.param: Maximum number of bytes the string can take in
Target encoding. UTF8 is used if null

member.summary: Contains all the native Objective-C methods that are called from Unity.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.NSObject
member.summary: Wrapper for the native Objective-C NSObject. Automatically decreases the reference counter when GC'd.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.SingletonMonoBehaviour`1
member.summary: A reliable singleton implementation for . Makes sure only one instance ever exists.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.SingletonMonoBehaviour`1.Instance
member.summary: A reference to singleton instance.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.SingletonMonoBehaviour`1.IsDestroyed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is in process of being destroyed.

member.name: M:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.SingletonMonoBehaviour`1.UpdateInstance
member.summary: Tries to find an existing instance in the scene, and creates one if there were none.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.Internal.UnityMessagesBroadcaster
member.summary: Provides static access to global Unity messages.

member.name: T:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.PeerId
member.summary: Uniquely represents a peer of the local multiplayer session.

member.name: P:LostPolygon.Apple.LocalMultiplayer.PeerId.Name
member.summary: Name of the peer.
